# Ferro ORM

> A high-performance, Rust-backed, Pydantic driven ORM for Python.

Ferro is a high-performance, Rust-backed ORM for Python with a familiar Pydantic-style API.

## Guides

- [Overview](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/index.md)
- [Connection](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/connection/index.md)
- [Models](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/models/index.md)
- [Fields](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/fields/index.md)
- [Relations](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/relations/index.md)
- [Queries](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/queries/index.md)
- [Migrations](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/migrations/index.md)
- [Transactions](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/transactions/index.md)
- [Contributing](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/contributing/index.md)

## API Reference

- [Overview](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/api/index.md)
- [Core Models](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/api/core-models/index.md)
- [Field Metadata](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/api/field-metadata/index.md)
- [Global Functions](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/api/global-functions/index.md)
- [Query Builder](https://syn54x.github.io/ferro-orm/api/query-builder/index.md)
